name: Sacrebleu Daniel!
description:
Objective

A busy crusher don't move forward. Feed the crusher on your side as much as you can by grabbing and launching anything you can get your hands on.
You lose if your crusher reachs the convoyer!

Controls

Move - WASD / Left Stick
Camera - Mouse / Right Stick
Trigger left arm - Left Mouse Click / Left Trigger
Trigger right arm - Right Mouse Click / Right Trigger
Jump - Space / A

Credits Development
